channel.title: Help! Server crashing, and with admins
channel.description:
Alright, im on my server for a while and then suddenly a guy named SYIPKPKER comes online and then it has i.e 53 people are online, then i type ::Players to see that most of the people are called null, i cant kick these people and then it just crashes my server, and syipkpker is still there.
I also need help with this, i want to allow admins to spawn and ban people, but only co-owners can do this atm, how can i change it so they are alloud to spawn and ban people?
Thanks guys.

item.title: Help! Server crashing, and with admins
item.dc:creator: @lemonx lemonx
item.description:
@lemonx wrote:

pk blooder it says that there is no text found…[br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2007, 08:04:47 AM[/size][hr]And add me on msn slaped_hard@hotmail.co.uk

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Server crashing, and with admins
item.dc:creator: @pk_blooder pk_blooder
item.description:
@pk_blooder wrote:

lemon for the banning, search in client.java for

if (command.startswith("ban"

you should see like

if (command.startswith("ban") && playerRights >= 3) {

replace the playerRights >= 3 to any number u want ( 0 normal players 1 mod’s 2 admin)

Read full topic
item.source: Help! Server crashing, and with admins

I have the Same thing it’s a crasher i suggest getting a anti-cheat client im trying to get one now once i get ill give you k?
